name: Clockwork Angel
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 113: Final Boss, with the limitation of "Stuck in a loop." You must fight the clockwork angel until you defeat it and break the loop.

Movement: WASD

Shoot: CLICK

You gain Void (currency) for damaging the boss. When you die, you gain void proportionate to the damage you dealt this fight, which you can spend on upgrades.
